title: Brand value of Reebok 2012 to 2017
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Brand value in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
In general Brand value in billion U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Brand value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1.2 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Brand value in billion U.S. dollars about 0.8 was reached at Year 2016, and 2017
